title: Sir Salomon, or, The cautious coxcomb a comedy as it is acted at His Royal Highness the Duke of York's Theatre.
author: Caryll, John, 1625-1711.
notes: Adaptation of: L'école des femmes / Molière.
Written by J. Caryll. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
